products.name: Novated Lease
products.description: As part of our salary sacrificing arrangements you can lease a car and pay your lease and running costs from your pre-tax salary with our Novated lease offering

products.name: Finance Lease
products.description: A Finance Lease is a tax effective method of acquiring eligible new or used vehicles or equipment for business use without tying up working capital. The Bank makes the purchase and rents it to the borrower for the agreed term

products.name: Hire Purchase
products.description: A Commercial Hire Purchase is an agreement for the Bank to purchase an asset at the customer's request.  The Bank gives the customer possession and use of the asset in return for regular repayments.  Once fully repaid ownership in the asset is transferred to the customer.

products.name: Goods Loan
products.description: A Goods Loan is a fixed rate loan used to finance the purchase of eligible new or used vehicles or equipment. The customer purchases and owns the asset and gives the Bank security over it.

products.name: Bank Bill Business Loan
products.description: A flexible term lending facility of $250,000 or more with market-linked pricing.  Suitable for businesses seeking funding for; business acquisition, expansion, or investment in property, plant or equipment.

products.name: Unsecured Personal Overdraft
products.description: Access to additional funds when you need it to cover unexpected expenses.

products.name: Concession Account
products.description: A low-cost bank account for Australians receiving government health or pension benefits.

products.name: Retirement Access Account
products.description: An everyday bank account designed for eligible retirees, which earns split interest on balances.

products.name: Maxi Saver
products.description: A savings account that offers a great interest rate with access to funds through a linked account via Internet and Phone Banking.

products.name: Farm Management Deposit Account
products.description: Set aside pre-tax income in profitable years to establish cash reserves and manage low income periods with our farm management deposit account product.

products.name: Business Term Deposit
products.description: Lock Away your money for a period of time and get a guaranteed return with our Business term deposit product

products.name: Commercial Unsecured Overdraft
products.description: Easy access to approved finance to manage everyday business expenses.

products.name: Commercial Overdraft
products.description: Easy access to approved finance to manage everyday business expenses.

products.name: Business Maximiser
products.description: This all-in-one lending account provides day-to-day transaction capability and funds for your business to take advantage of opportunities to grow.

products.name: Foreign Currency Account
products.description: Foreign Currency Accounts would mainly suit the business involved in both import and export as a Foreign Exchange Risk management tool.

products.name: Construction Loan
products.description: Our Construction Loan offers flexible finance options to suit the needs of property developers.

products.name: Foreign Currency Term Deposit
products.description: A Foreign Currency Term Deposit (FCTD) is a type of term deposit offered under a facility that allows you to invest foreign currency with us for a fixed term.
